name: Ansible Tower
description: Ansible Tower by Red Hat helps you scale IT automation, manage complex deployments and speed productivity. Extend the power of Ansible to your entire team.

name: AWX
description: AWX provides a web-based user interface, REST API, and task engine built on top of Ansible. It is the upstream project for Tower, a commercial derivative of AWX.

name: Ansible Lint
description: Checks Playbooks for best practices and behavior that could potentially be improved.

name: Ansible Later
description: Another best practice scanner. Checks Playbooks and Roles for best practices and behavior that could potentially be improved.

name: Ansible Doctor
description: Simple annotation like documentation generator for Ansible roles based on Jinja2 templates.

name: Ansible cmdb
description: Takes the output of Ansible's fact gathering and converts it into a static HTML page.

name: ARA, Ansible Run Analysis
description: ARA records Ansible Playbook runs and makes the recorded data available and intuitive for users and systems.

name: Mitogen for Ansible
description: Speed up Ansible substantially with Mitogen.

name: Molecule
description: Molecule aids in the development and testing of Ansible roles.

name: Packer  Ansible Provisioner
description: This Provisioner can be used to automate VM Image creation via Packer with Ansible.

name: Excel Ansible Inventory
description: Turn any Excel Spreadsheet into an Ansible Inventory.

name: terraform.py
description: Ansible dynamic inventory script for parsing Terraform state files.

name: ansible-navigator
description: A text-based user interface (TUI) for Ansible.

name: Ansible (Real Life) Good Practices
description: Best practice guidelines.

name: Testing Ansible Roles Against Windows with Test-Kitchen
description: Using Test-Kitchen with Ansible to apply playbooks to Windows machines and test them with Pester.

name: Ansible Best Practices by AndiDog
description: Practices covering many aspects of an Ansible setup, including hints to support different environments (testing, staging, production).

description: Ansible examples using Vagrant to deploy to local VMs.

name: T.A.D.S. boilerplate
description: Provision and deploy a Docker Swarm cluster to development environment and to production. Infrastructure as Code and DevOps best practices.

name: Openstack Ansible

name: DebOps
